sentences.sentence: Gawker melodramatically wrote that the 114, 000-plus victims "could be vulnerable to spam marketing and malicious hacking."
sentences.translation: Gawker戏剧性地写道，11.4万多名受害者“可能会收到大量的营销垃圾邮件和恶意黑客骚扰”。

sentences.sentence: Writes NASA, not too melodramatically, in a short essay on test pilots: "When it came to launch the never-before-flown space shuttle from the back of a 747, nerves of steel were required yet again."
